title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 84.3 - Purposes and use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 84.3 - Purposes and use

State Regulations

Information obtained from employee personnel records by
members of the board of education shall be used only for the purpose of aiding
the members of the board to fulfill their legal responsibilities in making
decisions in such employee personnel matters as appointments, assignments, promotions, demotions, remuneration, discipline or dismissal, or to aid in the
development and implementation of personnel policies, or such other uses as are
necessary to enable the board to carry out legal
responsibilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
84.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
